wikipedia_page.main: Neil Robinson (28 February 1929 – 4 October 2009) was a Church of England priest and Archdeacon of Suffolk from 1987  to 1994.Robinson was educated at Penistone Grammar School and Durham University; and was ordained in 1954. After a curacy in Hull he was Vicar of South Wigston from 1958 to 1969. After this he was Rector and Rural Dean of Market Bosworth from 1969 to 1983; and a Residentiary Canon at Worcester Cathedral from 1983 until his appointment as Archdeacon.

response: * Neil Robinson (footballer, born 1979), English football player for Macclesfield
* Neil Robinson (footballer, born 1957), English football player for Everton and Grimsby Town
* Neil Robinson (motorcyclist) (1962–1986), motorcycle racer from Northern Ireland
* Neil Robinson (table tennis), Great Britain table tennis player
* Neil Robinson (actor) (1935–1997), English actor in The Wringer
* Neil Robinson (baseball) (1908–1983), Negro league baseball player
